Master Answer:
On the ImmunizeBC Influenza (flu) clinic locator, 'drop in' means that you can present for an influenza vaccine (flu shot) during their business hours (appointment is not required). If you have any questions about a specific location, please contact the clinic directly.
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: Do we just show up for a free vaccine to the Shopper's Drug Mart on Hwy. 33 between their posted hours? It says 'drop in'.
